controllers
Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
  controllers.DatabaseManager

public class DatabaseManager
extends Object

This class manages the database of tasks stored locally. This manager will be updated from the webservice when the update data button is clicked on the mainscreen, as well as automatically when new tasks are created. There is a single instance of this class that can be accessed from the rest of the classes and all interactions with locally stored tasks must go through this manager.

Author:
zturchan
